name: Bible Moms Quiz | Bible Families | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who told his mother, 'Didn't you know I had to be about my Father's business'?
Who ordered two Hebrew midwives (named Shiphrah and Puah) to kill all baby boys born but to let all baby girls born live?
Who said, 'Naked I came from my mother's womb and naked I will depart'(NIV)?
All of these had a mother named Mary except one. Who was it?
questions.explanation:
Peter.

	John Mark (Acts 12:12), Jesus (Matthew 2:11)and James the less (or the younger) all had moms named Mary. Peter's mother is not named.

questions.text: What mother persuaded her daughter to ask for the head of John the Baptist?
questions.explanation:
Herodias.

	Matthew 14:1-12, Mark 6:14-29. Her daughter is known as Salome.

questions.text: What mother was praying so intensely for God to give her a child that a priest accused her of being drunk?
questions.explanation:
Hannah.

	Hannah became the mother of Samuel (I Samuel 1:10-17)

questions.text: What king threatened to cut a child in half in order to discover who the infant's real mother was?
Proverbs says, '...do not despise your mother when she is... ?
Jesus healed one of the apostles' mother-in-law. Whose mother-in-law was it?
On only a few occasions does Jesus say someone has 'Great faith'. One was a mother who asked for Jesus to heal her daughter. Who was she?
questions.explanation:
Her name is not known.

	She is known only as the Canaanite woman or the Syro-Phoenician woman. (Matthew 15:21-28, Mark 7:24)
